general_advisory: According to IMD forecast, above-normal rainfall expected in Odisha. Farmers advised to prepare for heavy rainfall, avoid irrigation, monitor crops for diseases, and store rainwater. Animal husbandry: Ensure deworming, vaccination, safe shelter, and clean drinking water.

advisory: Main field land preparation: puddle field twice, apply decomposed FYM, green manuring.
Basal dose application for different varieties.
Transplanting at appropriate spacing, seedlings per hill, rainwater storage.
Critical weed growth period: manual hoeing, pre-emergence application, hand weeding.
Delay intercultural operations based on rainfall forecast.
Draining excess water, delaying nitrogen top dressing and intercultural operations.
Raised bed nursery preparation, proper drainage for kharif vegetable crops.
Avoid planting during heavy rainfall, drain excess water.
Ensure deworming, vaccination against infectious diseases.
Provide safe shelter, clean drinking water, prevent mixing of rainwater.
Avoid grazing in open areas, protect animals from diseases and harsh weather.
